name: LLM File Renamer
description: Automatically renames media files using a local LLM to follow Jellyfin naming conventions.
overview: Uses local AI models via LLamaSharp to intelligently rename media files for optimal Jellyfin metadata scraping. No external services required - runs entirely locally.

versions.changelog: Added native library download support, sidebar menu integration, and improved plugin configuration.
Initial release with support for Movies, TV Shows, and Music. Includes built-in model downloader with progress tracking.
